meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Schnippert Thomas Zamora Vinita Kailasanath Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3962.

div.div:
2001 College Championship final game 2.
From the campus at UCLA.

td.p: Matt Schnippert, a sophomore at Florida State University from Jacksonville, Florida (subtotal of $11,000)
Thomas Zamora, a junior at the University of Southern California from Cypress, California (subtotal of $2,500)
Vinita Kailasanath, a sophomore at Stanford University from Laurel, Maryland (subtotal of $12,900)

tr.td: SCIENCE
ONE-WORD FILM TITLES
CHANGE ONE LETTER...
I REPRESENT
(Alex: You'll have to name the state each person represents in Congress.)
AMERICAN PIE
THIS ONE TIME AT BAND CAMP

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Vinita
Thomas
Matt

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Matt] The city is Colombo. It became the capital of Ceylon.)
...
(Johnny Gilbert: Congratulations, Vinita. As the winner of the College Championship, you will receive the Volvo V40 with 5 doors, up to 68 cubic feet of cargo room, and countless Volvo safety features. The choice is academic--the Volvo V40. Congratulations!)
MattWho is Christopher Columbus?
$3,101
ThomasWho was Christopher Columbus?
$5,800
VinitaWho is Christopher Columbus?
$1,001
Christopher Columbus')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In 1517 the Portuguese modified the name of a port ctiy of western Ceylon in honor of this man')

tr.td: CITY NAME ORIGINS
In 1517 the Portuguese modified the name of a port ctiy of western Ceylon in honor of this man
Vinita
Thomas
Matt
Vinita
Thomas
Matt
Tournament champion: $50,000 + a Volvo V40 + a trophy
2nd runner-up: $14,100
1st runner-up: $19,801
Vinita
Thomas
Matt

(including 1 DD),

(including 1 DD),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
